title: Lighter Flint Stone for Petrol Gas Fluid-Lighter Flints Replacement-Universal Flint (2.2mm) 35g/Pack(Approx 300pcs) Gold
features: Compatibility: 1 Pack of 300pcs genuine flints are compatible with most lighters including Zippo and Clipper
Material: lighter flint Stone is mainly made of Cerium
Application: Part(s) replacements for flint lighter (your DIY items)
Green Initiative: Protect the planet while getting your old lighter back to work
description: You`ll get excellent flint for lighters with great wear time and strong spark! Light weight and easy to carry. Flint Size : 2.2mm*5mm Package Included : 35g/Pack(Approx 300pcs) Gold color Flints Stones WE GUARANTEE THAT YOU WILL RECIEVE AT LEAST 300 PIECES WITHOUT ANY SHORTAGE ! Replacing the Flint: Open lid and remove insert. Turn insert upside down and remove screw and attach spring. Remove worn flint. Place new flint in tube. Replace the spring and screw. Turn screw as far as it will go (otherwise, cover will not close completely). If wheel binds after new is inserted, turn wheel backwards a few times. Tips: It is suggested that after the new flint stone is insert in. Rotate the flint wheel multiple times as usual to make it spin smoothly. In case the wheel is stuck, adjust the flint spring slightly clockwise or unclockwise by screwing the screw brass lid so that it goes smoothly. If adjusting the spring doesn't work, rotate the flint wheel unclockwise first and then quickly clockwise for a few times and you will be good to go.
